entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Waskaganish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:45 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -29.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Waskaganish Airport 2:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -29.9°C
Pressure: 102.6 kPa
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -45
Dewpoint: -35.5°C
Wind: W 27 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 29.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 43 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 35. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then periods of light snow. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
